subject: Baseball
Economic Conditions and Trends
lead_paragraph: The reasons include an economic downturn that coincided with the opening of the Mets’ new stadium in 2009 and a rash of player injuries that sank the team and disillusioned fans.
snippet: The reasons include an economic downturn that coincided with the opening of the Mets’ new stadium in 2009 and a rash of player injuries that sank the team and disillusioned fans.
